content.raw:
On raring compiled using internal embedded copy: works.
On trusty compiled using external urdfdom 0.2, I'm getting this failure:

```
In file included from /home/jrivero/code/sdformat2/src/parser_urdf.cc:22:0:
/usr/include/urdf_model/model.h: In member function 'void urdf::ModelInterface::initTree(std::map<std::basic_string<char>, std::basic_string<char> >&)':
/usr/include/urdf_model/model.h:147:9: error: 'cout' is not a member of 'std'
         std::cout << "Before adding: " << parent_link->child_joints.size() << std::endl;
         ^
/usr/include/urdf_model/model.h:149:9: error: 'cout' is not a member of 'std'
         std::cout << "After adding: " << parent_link->child_joints.size() << std::endl;
         ^
/home/jrivero/code/sdformat2/src/parser_urdf.cc: In function 'void ReduceCollisionToParent(UrdfLinkPtr, const string&, UrdfCollisionPtr)':
/home/jrivero/code/sdformat2/src/parser_urdf.cc:316:41: warning: 'boost::shared_ptr<std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<urdf::Collision> > > urdf::Link::getCollisions(const string&) const' is deprecated (declared at /usr/include/urdf_model/link.h:264) [-Wdeprecated-declarations]
   cols = _link->getCollisions(_groupName);
                                         ^
/home/jrivero/code/sdformat2/src/parser_urdf.cc: In function 'void ReduceVisualToParent(UrdfLinkPtr, const string&, UrdfVisualPtr)':
/home/jrivero/code/sdformat2/src/parser_urdf.cc:356:38: warning: 'boost::shared_ptr<std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<urdf::Visual> > > urdf::Link::getVisuals(const string&) const' is deprecated (declared at /usr/include/urdf_model/link.h:255) [-Wdeprecated-declarations]
   viss = _link->getVisuals(_groupName);
                                      ^
```
A missing  #include <iostream> somewhere? Are you able to reproduce it?
content.html:
On raring compiled using internal embedded copy: works. On trusty compiled using external urdfdom 0.2, I'm getting this failure:

In file included from /home/jrivero/code/sdformat2/src/parser_urdf.cc:22:0:
/usr/include/urdf_model/model.h: In member function 'void urdf::ModelInterface::initTree(std::map<std::basic_string<char>, std::basic_string<char> >&)':
/usr/include/urdf_model/model.h:147:9: error: 'cout' is not a member of 'std'
         std::cout << "Before adding: " << parent_link->child_joints.size() << std::endl;
         ^
/usr/include/urdf_model/model.h:149:9: error: 'cout' is not a member of 'std'
         std::cout << "After adding: " << parent_link->child_joints.size() << std::endl;
         ^
/home/jrivero/code/sdformat2/src/parser_urdf.cc: In function 'void ReduceCollisionToParent(UrdfLinkPtr, const string&, UrdfCollisionPtr)':
/home/jrivero/code/sdformat2/src/parser_urdf.cc:316:41: warning: 'boost::shared_ptr<std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<urdf::Collision> > > urdf::Link::getCollisions(const string&) const' is deprecated (declared at /usr/include/urdf_model/link.h:264) [-Wdeprecated-declarations]
   cols = _link->getCollisions(_groupName);
                                         ^
/home/jrivero/code/sdformat2/src/parser_urdf.cc: In function 'void ReduceVisualToParent(UrdfLinkPtr, const string&, UrdfVisualPtr)':
/home/jrivero/code/sdformat2/src/parser_urdf.cc:356:38: warning: 'boost::shared_ptr<std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<urdf::Visual> > > urdf::Link::getVisuals(const string&) const' is deprecated (declared at /usr/include/urdf_model/link.h:255) [-Wdeprecated-declarations]
   viss = _link->getVisuals(_groupName);
                                      ^

A missing #include <iostream> somewhere? Are you able to reproduce it?
